t: GOD OF WAR
s: His war on the gods of Olympus long past, Kratos builds a new life for himself in the remote Norse wilds. Seeking to put the rage that defined most of his life behind him, Kratos inadvertently sparks a feud with a mysterious cult of berserkers after attempting to save a stranger being mauled by a monstrous bear. But for the former Ghost of Sparta, no good deed goes unpunished. A brand...

t: God of War (franchise) - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - God of War is an action-adventure game franchise created by David Jaffe and developed by Sony's Santa Monica Studio. It began in 2005 on the PlayStation 2 (PS2) video game console and has become a flagship series for PlayStation, consisting of nine installments across multiple platforms.

t: Amazons | God of War Wiki | Fandom
s: March 7, 2025 - The Amazons (also known as Delos Warriors) are enemies in God of War: Ascension that are encountered on the island of Delos. Amazons are skilled and challenging women that wield an elemental spear which can be used to throw, fight with, and project powerful blasts.
